title: Chilean Congress approves bill reducing work week to 40 hours
description: The bill passed by a large margin and is expected to be signed by Chilean President Gabriel Boric.

title: District attorney prosecuting Trump sues Republican Jim Jordan

title: How serious is the Pentagon files leak for the US and its allies?
description: Documents reveal Ukrainian military preparations and the Pentagon's thinking across a range of sensitive global issues.

title: UN chief sounds alarm on Somalia’s ‘massive’ need for aid
description: UN says about half of Somalia's population will need humanitarian assistance this year, with 8.3 million affected.

description: Evan Gershkovich's family welcomes the US government decision to formally designate reporter as 'wrongfully detained'.

description: Brazilian president, who is taking a massive delegation to China, also aims to re-assert Brazil's place on global stage.

title: Democrats set 2024 convention in Chicago; Biden eyes re-election
description: US President Joe Biden, 80, continues to signal intent to run for re-election, but he has yet to announce a formal bid.

title: Economy tops Erdogan’s manifesto for Turkish elections
description: President and his party face challenge at polls after dive in the lira and surge in inflation.

title: Germany expels Chad’s ambassador in tit-for-tat move
description: Germany's action comes a week after Chad expelled its ambassador from N'djamena for 'non-respect of diplomatic customs'.

title: Armenia, Azerbaijan say troops killed in border shootout

description: People in south Lebanon fear a wider confrontation with Israel after cross-border violence.

title: Taliban ban on women has forced UN into ‘appalling choice’

title: Kenya presidency rules out default as cash crunch delays salaries

title: There is nothing ethical about profiting from sexual exploitation
